description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ql9g","text":"This protocol describes the procedure of irradiation and single-cell dissociation of hESCs and cortical spheroids for MULTI-Seq barcoding and sequencing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65qnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"claaf","text":"Protocol Overview","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3ikm","text":"A. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"djb42","text":"Culture hESCs with feeder-free system (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E46EE3109A974899A4EDE3EAA08D7BA9","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b4mcqu2w"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f83o9","text":"3 days before irradiation, passage cells and let them grow to approximately 50% confluence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4av0h","text":"On the day of irradiation, change media to hESC media + 10uM Rock Inhibitor (RI).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b0j0h","text":"Using a discrete cesium source, irradiate cells in plates at desired dosage. We used 0, 0.5, 2, 5 and 10 Gy.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6j10m","text":"24 hours post irradiation, dissociate cells by aspirating media and adding   of accutase per well of a 6-well plate. Return to incubator for   to 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aa8hd","text":"Resuspend cells using   of PBS- to dilute accutase. Spin down for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":66,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eo371","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dt8q","text":"Aspirate supernatant and resuspend cells in   PBS- per well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6hcck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ps18","text":"Label cells with MULTIseq oligos as described in MULTI-Seq Barcoding and Library Preparation protocol (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.kxygx3xzkg8j/v1)  and proceed with sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":106,"length":45}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D13D9FCD48EF4406B96D6BB066A402E3","url":"https://doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.kxygx3xzkg8j/v1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"112mp","text":"At 25 days in differentiation, two organoids per condition were transferred with   of media into a 1.5mL Cryovial with screw top. Using a discrete cesium source, irradiate organoids in vials at desired dosage. We used 0, 0.5, 2, 5 and 10 Gy. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5d8kg","text":"Post-irradiation, transfer both organoids per condition into one well of a 6-well low adherence plate with  additional media. Add Rock Inhibitor (RI) to final concentration of  10uM.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"50unp","text":"24 hours post irradiation, prepare   of Activated Papain Solution per irradiation condition:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mhco","text":"To each 5mL of Dissociation Media, add   of 0.5M EDTA, 23ul of 0.1uM β-mercaptoethanol,   of 5.5mM L-Cystine solution, and   of papain suspension.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":123,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"172","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3vj8","text":"Transfer the solution to the   water bath for ~  to 30 minutes to activate. The solution will gradually go from cloudy to transparent.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9rgbr","text":"Sterilize by passing the solution through a 0.22 μm syringe filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdvqn","text":"Collect cortical spheroids and sediment. Aspirate the media and rinse once with PBS+.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fm6b6","text":"Add   Activated Papain Solution to each well and return to the incubator for ~  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8v9br","text":"While dissociating, prepare 15mL Trypsin Inhibitor solution per   of Activated Papain Solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c72qg","text":"For each 15mL Trypsin Inhibitor Solution: Add   Trypsin Inhibitor to  of usual organoid media. Mix thoroughly and sterilize by filtering through a 0.22 μm syringe filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9niq","text":"After   of dissociation, add   of Trypsin Inhibitor solution to each well and very gently triturate with a 5mL strippette to dissociate. Avoid excessive pipetting and bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2700,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n5aj","text":"Strain mixture through a 70μm cell strainer into a 50mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ctpvs","text":"Use remaining   Trypsin Inhibitor Solution to rinse the well to collect any cells left behind, then pass this through the same 70μm strainer to release any cells still stuck in the mesh.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5jm1k","text":"Spin down cells at   for   and aspirate the media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"forgk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1unk7","text":"Resuspend dissociated cells in   0.2% BSA in PBS+ with RI per condition, strain through a 40um mesh cell strainer and FACS sort for desired number of live cells and to remove debris.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8k99f","text":"Spin down live cells at   for  . Resuspend in 0.2% BSA in PBS+ with 10uM RI in appropriate volume according to single-cell sequencing protocol, count cells, and proceed to single-cell sequencing according to manufacturer protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4itso","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":0,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
